name: CubeDventure (DogSi)
description:
You are a cube. Now this is your reality for the next 15 minutes.

And the first thing you meet in this new beautiful world is a certain snowman in a top hat. He tells you that you are here for a reason. You are here to complete the game he made and claim the cake!

But in the end, something doesn't go according to plan... otherwise, as usual :)
